input.sentences: many girls in bikinis were involved
output.sentences: It was a cold morning in January when a polar plunge for charity was held at the lake.
Most participants barely got in before exiting the cold water.
But some of the more scantily dressed coeds decided to make it fun.
They grabbed the hands of nearby plungers and splashed their way towards the safety guards.
It was a charity event in frigid water, but some people know how to celebrate under challenging conditions.
